name: Moon (itch) (Rileyandmoon)
description:
This game was made for a YouTube challenge. I challenged  myself to make a working game with as little bugs as possible for the original GameBoy in only 8 hours. This is the first time I've ever made a game outside of messing around with engines like RPG Maker (RPG Maker is NOT used to make this game). I am pretty proud of what I got done in only 8 hours. 

Once the youtube video is up a link will be posted here!

Moon is a game about a girl wanting to go to the moon. To do so she needs to find rocket fuel to power her space rocket, can you help her find it?

Controls: arrow keys to move, z=a, x=b
